name: Bolo Mrówkojad
overview: Bolo Mrówkojad is an Platform game, developed by Turnips and published by Eureka Soft & Hardware, which was released in Europe in 1997. The task of the player is to lead an anteater to the end of all five stages, avoiding all living creatures and ground or movable obstacles. Contact with each of them means a loss of life and return to the last checkpoint. After each completed level the player receives a password. The game doesn't contain any power ups. The gameplay is all about timing and jumping.
